links.description: Google reportedly working on a secret project to halt cyber crimes. messages.body: Why Google Made Its Self-Driving Car So Darn Cute $GOOG http://stks.co/s26FR

links.title: Why Google Made Its Self-Driving Car So Darn Cute
links.description: While Google is notorious for knowing computers better than people, it understands that people might be a bit afraid of its self-driving cars. So rather than show the power and cool-factor of its new autonomous vehicles, Google made them look like Little Tikes cars, built them out of foam, and capped speeds at 25mph.

links.description: Rumors spread on Monday that BlackBerry Limited ( BBRY) might be acquired by Apple Inc. ( AAPL), sending the stock price up over 6% in roughly 30 minutes.
